Author: rachihc
Text: Take your time and don't answer if you feel not to. Just think what is best for you, to keep distance, to call her out in her hypocrisy or to reestablish contact. Perhaps she will apologize, but I would not put much expectations on it. But, now, be selfish, do what you think is best for YOU, you don't owe her anything.

Author: renniw_
Text: No contact sounds like a good approach in this case. I read your other post and it's not healthy to have a friend whose eating habits mimic your own. She obviously has issues with you and your food intake vs. her own, and you don't need that in your life!
